tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE production_downtime_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date TIMESTAMP,
  downtime_duration INTERVAL,
  incident_cause TEXT,
  resolution TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  downtime_duration INT,
  cause VARCHAR,
  resolution VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE root_causes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  cause_description VARCHAR,
  resolution_plan VARCHAR,
  FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES incidents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE NOT NULL,
  downtime_start TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  downtime_end TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  resolution_description TEXT,
  resolution_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES incidents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE downtime_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    downtime_start TIMESTAMP,
    downtime_end TIMESTAMP,
    duration INTERVAL
);
